title: Bloomberg Markets: McCarthy on Harvey's Impact on Chemicals
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: McCarthy on Harvey's Impact on Chemicals
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kevin W McCarthy Partner Vertical Research Partners Discussing the impact of Hurricane Harvey on the chemicals industry and stocks that could be affected.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
